page.title: 06MRS DIXON'S DAY-STANION
page.content: on the Goverment youth training scheme.I teach two lessons of 1 hour and 20 minutes each-typewriting and word processing-and a free period in between. { 2.30 p.m.}I leave work and go to collect Nina. { 3.45 p.m.}Liam and Abbe come home. Then over to Brigstock,a village 2 miles from Stanion for Liam's music lesson. I call at my sister's for a coffee. { 5.15 p.m.}Back home to Stanion for tea with my family. I have to be in Corby at{7p.m.}for a netball match. Home by {8.p.m.},the children are in bed by{9.00 p.m.} Then I have time to sit down, read the paper, play records or watch television. I finally go to bed at { {11 p.m.
